Description: Posted by  Nur Syafiqah Ali  Human Resource Executive at Kamlax Global Technologies Sdn Bhd  Send InMail  Job Purpose Summary  -Involved in the Business requirements, Business Requirement gathering, banking solution, and driving the solutioning of all projects, from channels, middleware to backend hosts.  -Ensure that projects comply with the bank’s established architecture standards and principles i.e. reusability, scalability, resilience.  -Business context diagrams, Viability assessments, Architecture decisions.  -Provide two key areas of support:  • With a business focus, ensure that the solution meets the business requirements.  • With an enterprise focus, ensure that the enterprise requirements for reuse, compliance to standards, principles, traceability to enterprise reference models, and alignment with the target enterprise architecture vision.     Experience  • At least 4 years experience in IT Business Applications related functions – development & support     Key Responsibilities and Accountabilities  • Produce architectural designs, and review requirement specifications and interface specifications.  • Utilize SOA framework to standardize and simplify integration.  • Analyze changes & impact on existing systems of proposed solutions.  • Decision on the Technical Approach to be used to address systems’ enhancements.  • Proposal on the enhancement of applications for better performance.  • Provide options/alternatives available to address Users Business Requirements and recommendations on a software solution  • Facilitate decisions on the Technical Approach to be used to address systems’ enhancements.  • Responsible for business case and architecture papers.  • Act as SPOC for GITA during RFI and RFP process.
